snippet: For all the eloquent and evocative writing there has been about golf, some of the best contributions to the lore, appreciation and understanding of the game have been spoken.
abstract: For all the eloquent and evocative writing there has been about golf, some of the best contributions to the lore, appreciation and understanding of the game have been spoken.

headline.main: A Sport That Inspires a Sharp Wit
